name: Sherlock Holmes
title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
description: A collection of twelve short stories featuring the famous detective Sherlock Holmes and his faithful companion Dr. Watson.

name: Pride and Prejudice
title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A romantic novel that explores the issues of social class, marriage, and morality in early 19th-century England.
A chilling portrayal of a totalitarian regime that uses surveillance and mind control to maintain power.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A novel set in the American South during the 1930s, addressing serious issues like racial inequality and moral growth.

name: The Hobbit
title: The Hobbit
description: The journey of Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit who embarks on an unexpected adventure with a group of dwarves.

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: The first book in the Harry Potter series, introducing readers to a young wizard's journey at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

name: The Da Vinci Code
title: The Da Vinci Code
description: A gripping tale that combines art, history, and religion in a quest to solve a centuries-old mystery.

name: Dune
title: Dune
description: A science fiction epic set on the desert planet Arrakis, focusing on politics, religion, and ecology.

name: Moby-Dick
title: Moby-Dick
description: The narrative of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to kill the white whale, Moby Dick.

name: Meditations
title: Meditations
description: A series of personal writings by the Roman Emperor Marcus Aurelius, offering insights into Stoic philosophy.

name: The Great Gatsby
title: The Great Gatsby
description: A portrayal of the American Jazz Age and the disillusionment of the American Dream.

name: Hamlet
title: Hamlet
description: Shakespeare's tragedy about the Prince of Denmark's quest for revenge against his uncle.

name: Jane Eyre
title: Jane Eyre
description: The story of an orphaned girl who becomes a governess and falls in love with her employer.

name: Treasure Island
title: Treasure Island
description: The tale of young Jim Hawkins and his adventure to find buried treasure.

name: The Chronicles of Narnia
title: The Chronicles of Narnia
description: A series of seven fantasy novels that take place in the magical land of Narnia.
